property.name: fieldToCompare
property.label: Field to Compare
property.description: API name of the field to compare (e.g., 'startDate'). This field represents the due date.

property.name: comparisonDateField
property.label: Comparison Date Field
property.description: API name of the comparison date field (e.g., 'endDate'). This field represents the date to compare against the due date.
